item.title: 哈萨克斯坦大亨正在商谈向国家支付 10 亿美元的事宜
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦最富有的人之一正在商谈向国家支付约 10 亿美元，作为政府对该国首任总统时期积累的财富进行调查的一部分。【原文：One of Kazakhstan’s richest men is in talks to pay about $1 billion to the state as part of a government investigation into wealth accumulated under the country’s first president.】

item.title: 美国威胁贸易，加拿大寻求更多途径向中国运输石油
item.description: 自加拿大跨山输油管扩建工程于今年 5 月竣工以来，几乎每天都有一艘满载油砂原油的油轮从温哥华狮门大桥下驶过，前往太平洋周边的炼油厂。【原文：Almost every day since the expansion of Canada’s Trans Mountain pipeline was completed in May, a tanker laden with oil sands crude shipped through the line has passed under Vancouver’s Lions Gate Bridge en route to refineries around the Pacific.】

item.title: 俄罗斯一月份石油预算收入接近一年最低水平
item.description: 由于全球原油价格疲软以及对国家炼油厂的支付增加，俄罗斯 1 月份国家预算中的石油收入接近一年来的最低水平。【原文：Russia’s proceeds from oil in the state budget in January were near a one-year low due to weaker global crude prices and higher payouts to the nation’s refiners.】

item.title: 中国的贸易报复是一种警告，为达成协议留有余地
item.description:
在中国政府对华盛顿关税闪电战的首次回应中，大豆和其他备受瞩目的目标被排除在外。这绝非偶然。【原文：

Soybeans and other high-profile targets were left out of Beijing’s first response to Washington’s tariff blitz. That’s no accident.

】

item.title: 波兰延长利率暂停期，经济岌岌可危
item.description: 波兰中央银行将其稳定利率期延长至第 16 个月，经济增长的预期反弹增加了行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）反对降息的理由。【原文：Poland’s central bank extended its period of stable interest rates into 16th month with an expected rebound in economic growth adding to Governor Adam Glapinski’s arguments against the need for cuts.】

item.title: Neuberger Berman 将从 Fintech 购买 10 亿美元消费债务
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，Neuberger Berman 集团将在未来几年内从消费贷款机构 ClarityPay 购入多达 10 亿美元的贷款，这标志着这家金融技术初创公司达成了最大的购买协议。【原文：Neuberger Berman Group is buying as much as $1 billion of loans from consumer lender ClarityPay over the course of the next few years, marking the largest purchase agreement for the financial technology startup, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 奈拉表现持续稳定，尼日利亚扩大美元使用范围
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行已将外汇局的美元准入期限延长了四个月，因为当地流动性的改善促进了奈拉近期的上涨。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank has extended the dollar access of foreign exchange bureaus by four months, amid improved local liquidity that has contributed to recent naira gains.】

item.title: 任天堂投资者透过严峻的销售形势展望 Switch 2 的光明未来
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）惊叹于任天堂销量暴跌与股价飙升之间的反差。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov marvels at the contrast between Nintendo’s plummeting sales and rocketing share price.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团首席执行官称马里矿业发展令人严重关切
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）首席执行官邓肯-万布拉德（Duncan Wanblad）表示，马里政府对采掘业的全面改革有可能阻碍企业在这个拥有世界第二大金矿的国家投资。【原文：The Malian government’s overhaul of its extraction industry risks deterring companies from investing in the nation that’s home to the world’s second-largest gold mine, according to Anglo American Plc Chief Executive Officer Duncan Wanblad.】

item.title: 特朗普希望美国建立主权财富基金。它们是什么？
item.description: 主权财富基金是世界上最强大、最神秘的投资者之一，据估计其账户中的资金超过 13 万亿美元。主权财富基金由许多国家的政府实体管理，以开出金融界最大的支票而闻名，偶尔也会引发巨大的丑闻。【原文：Sovereign wealth funds are some of the most powerful — and secretive — investors in the world, with more than $13 trillion estimated to be in their accounts. Run by government entities in a wide variety of countries, they’re known to write the biggest checks in finance and have occasionally been the source of enormous scandal.】

item.title: 美国关税延迟引发北美 30 天抢购潮
item.description: 虽然唐纳德-特朗普总统已搁置了对加拿大和墨西哥的关税威胁，但制造商们并不抱任何侥幸心理。【原文：While President Donald Trump has put his tariff threats against Canada and Mexico on hold, manufacturers aren’t taking any chances.】

item.title: 英国将允许在更多地方建造核电站
item.description: 英国将放宽核电厂建设地点的规定，以重振陷入困境的核电行业。【原文：The UK is set ease the rules around where nuclear power plants can be built in a bid to revitalize the struggling sector.】

item.title: 邦吉公司（Bunge）全年利润降至 2019 年以来最低点
item.description: 邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）预计，由于地缘政治不确定性加剧，今年的利润将缩水至大流行病爆发前的最低水平。【原文：Bunge Global SA expects profits this year to shrink to the lowest level since before the pandemic as the crop trader sees heightened geopolitical uncertainty.】

item.title: 马斯克即将上任，贝森特面临财政部首次债务考验
item.description: 彭博社记者将在美国东部时间上午 8 点/格林尼治标准时间下午 1 点的现场问答中回答有关特朗普的欧盟关税威胁及其可能对市场产生的影响的问题。在此收听。【原文：Bloomberg reporters answer questions about Trump's EU tariff threats and the impact it could have on markets in a Live Q&A at 8 a.m. EST/1 p.m. GMT. Listen here.】

item.title: Uber 在奥斯汀推出 Waymo 前开放候补名单
item.description: 在计划于今年晚些时候在奥斯汀推出无人驾驶汽车之前，优步技术公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. has set up a waitlist for customers interested in requesting a driverless Waymo vehicle in Austin, ahead of a planned launch later this year.】

item.title: 华丽七侠增长放缓，威胁 S&P 500 指数反弹
item.description: 上周，DeepSeek 作为人工智能威胁的出现使英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.昨晚，Alphabet 公司令人失望的财报引发了对其资本支出的质疑，并使其股价出现了一年多来最严重的下跌。【原文：Last week, DeepSeek’s emergence as an AI threat wiped half a trillion dollars of value off Nvidia Corp. Last night, Alphabet Inc.’s disappointing earnings sparked questions about its capital expenditures and put its stock on pace for the worst drop in more than a year.】

item.title: 默克停产加卫苗显示大片疫苗在中国的窘境
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co.去年，加卫苗在中国的需求曾一度飙升，但很快就萎缩了，以至于这家美国制药巨头在本周早些时候呼吁停止发货。【原文：Merck & Co.’s blockbuster vaccine Gardasil has had a roller-coaster ride in China. A post-Covid surge in demand for the cancer-preventing shot quickly deflated last year, to the point the US pharmaceutical giant made the call earlier this week to halt shipments.】

item.title: 战神公司的战备资金因筹资而增至创纪录的 1,330 亿美元
item.description: 2024 年，信贷投资需求推动战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp.【原文：Demand for credit investments drove Ares Management Corp.’s fundraising to a record in 2024, boosting the firm’s war chest to $133 billion — its biggest ever.】

item.title: 瑞士监管机构 Finma 反对瑞银关于竞争力的诉求
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构首席执行官表示，他正在顶住压力，将瑞银集团与全球同行的竞争力作为其监管方法中的一个明确因素。【原文：The chief executive of Switzerland’s financial regulator signaled that he’s resisting pressure to accept the competitiveness of UBS Group AG against its global peers as an explicit factor in its approach to supervision.】

item.title: 降息在即，挪威房价创2022年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 随着抵押贷款规定的放宽和央行降息预期的启动，挪威调整后的住房价格以三年来最快的速度增长。【原文：Norway’s adjusted home prices grew at the fastest pace in three years as a loosening of mortgage rules and an expected start to the central bank’s interest-rate cuts spurred demand.】

item.title: 交易员对贸易战风险进行定价，美元加速下滑
item.description: 美元对几乎所有主要货币都下跌了，因为交易员们继续对即将爆发全面贸易战的风险进行定价。【原文：The dollar fell against almost all major currencies as traders continued to price out the risk of an imminent full blown trade war.】

item.title: 南非商业情绪跌至 2021 年骚乱以来最低水平
item.description: 2021 年 7 月，南非发生了致命的骚乱、抢劫和纵火事件，供应链中断，产出减少。【原文：An index measuring South African business conditions slumped to the lowest level since July 2021, when deadly riots, looting and arson disrupted supply chains and curtailed output.】

item.title: Natixis 称法国 2024 年赤字可能低于预期
item.description: Natixis 经济学家表示，法国的财政困难可能没有预测的那么严重，因为数据显示去年国家中央财政赤字有所减少。【原文：France’s fiscal difficulties may not be as acute as forecast, Natixis economists said after data showed a smaller central state deficit last year.】

item.title: 相信外星人断送了这位互联网先驱的事业。现在他正面临牢狱之灾
item.description: 约瑟夫-费尔马吉（Joseph Firmage）帮助创造了今天的数字经济。如今，他正被反重力机器投资者起诉，并声称受到牙买加电信诈骗团伙的追捕，还有一个人假装是史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）。【原文：Joseph Firmage helped create today’s digital economy. These days, he’s being sued by antigravity-machine investors and claiming to be hounded by a Jamaican wire-fraud gang, with a guy pretending to be Steven Mnuchin along for the ride.】

item.title: 糖果粉碎机引发非洲游戏热潮，收入突破 18 亿美元
item.description: 研究显示，受手机娱乐需求的刺激，去年非洲游戏产业的增长速度几乎是全球平均水平的六倍。【原文：Africa’s gaming industry grew almost six times faster than the global average last year, spurred by demand for entertainment on mobile phones, research showed.】

item.title: 竞相涌向边境制造商在特朗普即将到来的关税下争分夺秒
item.description: 在疯狂的 72 小时内，唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁要对加拿大、墨西哥和中国征收惩罚性的新关税，导致股市和货币暴跌，并给世界贸易带来了冲击波。【原文：Over a frantic 72 hours, President Donald Trump’s threat of punishing new tariffs on Canada, Mexico and China sent stocks and currencies tumbling and shock waves through world trade.】

item.title: 卡尼提议取消加拿大资本利得税增税政策
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）计划宣布，如果他在自由党领袖竞选中获胜并成为总理，他将不会落实提高加拿大资本利得税的提议。【原文：Mark Carney plans to announce he won’t follow through with a proposed increase to Canada’s capital gains tax if he wins the Liberal Party leadership race and becomes prime minister, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说 JD.com 重新燃起收购德国 Ceconomy 的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国电子商务公司 JD.com Inc. 再次表达了收购德国电子产品零售商 Ceconomy AG 的兴趣。【原文：Chinese e-commerce firm JD.com Inc. has renewed its interest in acquiring German electronics retailer Ceconomy AG, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: EFishery 支持者将权衡清算或收购等方案
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）查阅的一份文件显示，鉴于印尼农业科技公司eFishery涉嫌会计欺诈，一名负责调查该公司涉嫌会计欺诈案的顾问建议投资者尽快在本月内决定是清算还是重组这家备受瞩目的初创公司。【原文：An adviser probing the alleged accounting fraud at Indonesian agritech company eFishery recommended that investors make a decision on whether to liquidate or restructure the company as soon as this month, in light of the rapid unraveling of the high-profile startup, according to a document reviewed by Bloomberg News.】
